review: Cutting off when in Airplay mode. Glitches when airplaying youtube(through youtube app) and other video sites. Slow when starting Airplay on Mac. Resetting the devices may solve issues, however for short periods. Good product though that needs improvements.
author: Vladimir Ghahramanyan

review: It does exactly as advertised.  Easy to setup.
author: Darren DZ

review: We love how quick our Apple TV is!!!
author: Samantha

review: This device has another customer iCloud information. This item wasn't a new item as advertised. Will ship back!
author: Sherika Brown

review: Power cycled constantly. I'm sure it's just a bad one. Amazon refunded money though.
author: BigJoe

review: Apple snob, I like it. I like to buy s***.
author: Eric Puckett
